metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21850 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An exploitable integer overflow vulnerability exists within the MPEG-4decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Content libraryv1.0.1. A specially crafted MPEG-4 input can cause an integer overflow whenthe library encounters an atom using the “trun” FOURCC code due tounchecked arithmetic resulting in a heap-based buffer overflow that causesmemory corruption. An attacker can convince a user to open a video totrigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
